alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 1:15AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fairfield and northwestern New Haven Counties through 200 AM EDT... At 115 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bethel, or near Newtown, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waterbury, Danbury, Shelton, Naugatuck, Southbury, Newtown, Trumbull, Monroe, Bethel, Seymour, Brookfield, Orange, Derby, Weston and Redding. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
